name: Cantosino.com
description: Launched on the Canto blockchain in 2023, Cantosino is a decentralized betting protocol that offers a fair and unrestricted betting experience and unique yield farming opportunities. Using Turbo Lending with Real Yield Dividends, users are able to secure predictable yields from protocol revenue. Cantosino offers a range of original and classic casino games, with plans to extend its games lobby to include Poker and other favorites. SINO is primarily a DAO token that also provides holders with staking opportunities to earn protocol dividends and discounted platform fees for players.
